title: Persistent (Favorite Teams, Scoreboard, News, Video)
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user views the slide out menu
custom_expected:
Then the user will verify the following items are persistent:
- Favorite Team (will only appear is favorite teams selected)
- MiLB.tv
- Scoreboard
- News
- Video
- Teams

title: Teams
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the Teams button
custom_expected: The user is taken to the list of teams which is in alphabetical order, if favorite team(s) selected they will appear on top

title: Audio
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_expected: Then the MiLB GameDay Audio page will launch as an internal webview within the app, it will not launch externally outside the app

title: Configured Links for 2017 (if applicable)_MIAN-636
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on a link configured in extras (i.e. Triple-A All Star Vote)
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the links configured in extras.

custom_steps_separated.content: When there is a MiLB ASG Ballot within the more menu available in 2017
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the link is placed below Gameday Audio

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the MiLB ASG Ballot title
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the title is: 

Esurance Triple-A All-Star Ballot

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the following:

QA: http://qa.milb.com/milb/events/asg/y2017/ballot/ballot.jsp

PROD: http://www.milb.com/milb/events/asg/y2017/ballot/ballot.jsp

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user accesses the link to vote
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should only be able to vote on the following days:

Date to launch in PROD: May 26, 2017
Date voting ends: June 23, 2017

title: Players Position
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user accesses the More menu
custom_expected: Then the user will see the Players Search link with no icon, and be placed above the Standings link

title: Players
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Players search link
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to an internal web, points to the following: http://m.milb.com/teams/roster/

title: Standings
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on Standings
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to the an internal web view, for which Triple-A / International are the defaults in the drop-downs
 http://wap.milb.com/milb/android/standings/

title: Stats
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on Stats
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to the Stats page for the current year, page does not have a header nor footer
and can sort by Class or League

title: MiLB.com Podcast
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps MiLB.com Podcast
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to an internal web view of the Podcasts pointing to: http://www.milb.com/podcast

title: FAQs
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on FAQ
custom_expected:
Then the user should verify that they are taken to the FAQs page 
and the text contains the current year

title: About MiLB.com
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on About MiLB.com
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the internal web view of About MiLB.com

title: Games & Apps (if applicable)
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on any of the available Games or App links
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to either:
- the corresponding app (if installed on the device) 
or 
- the google play store to purchase/download (if not installed on the device)

title: Terms & Conditions
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on Terms and Conditions
custom_expected: The user is taken to the internal web view of the Terms and Conditions

title: Privacy Policy
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on Privacy Policy
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the internal web view of the Privacy Policy

title: Contact Us
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Contact Us
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to an external web view Contact Us form

title: About MiLB First Pitch
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on About MiLB
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to an internal page which contains the following:
- Application Version
- Android OS Version
- Device Manufacturer
- Device Model
- Device UUID
- WiFi MAC Address
- IMEI
- Device Push ID

title: Settings
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps: When the user taps on Settings
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to the Settings page which contains:
- MiLB.com account
- favorite teams
- notifications
- scoreboard refresh rate

title: Preserve Settings
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the main slide out nav menu
custom_steps:
When the user makes a change to a setting
And backgrounds, then kills the application
When the user relaunches the app
And navigates back to the settings page
custom_expected: The settings the user changed should be preserved

title: The 'More' section links appear on the bottom of the slide out nav
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And is not a fresh install or first run
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
And the user opens the slide out nav.
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the 'More' section items below the persistent app section.

i.e. Postseason (if applicable), Audio, Players, Standings, Stats, MiLB.com Podcast, FAQ, About MiLB.com, Game or Apps (MLB.com At Bat, MLB.com Ballpark), Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, Contact Us, About MiLB First Pitch
